scripts.pre-commit:check: pnpm run check && pnpm run type-check && pnpm run test
scripts.pre-push:check: pnpm run ci:check && pnpm run type-check && pnpm run test && pnpm run build
scripts.clean:modules: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf apps/*/node_modules && rm -rf packages/*/node_modules && rm -rf .turbo
scripts.prepare: [ -d .git ] && lefthook install || echo 'Skipping lefthook (not a git repo)'
scripts.db:pull: cd packages/db && pnpm run db:pull && cd ../..
scripts.db:push: cd packages/db && pnpm run db:push && cd ../..
scripts.db:generate: cd packages/db && pnpm run db:generate && cd ../..
scripts.db:migrate: cd packages/db && pnpm run db:migrate && cd ../..
scripts.db:studio: cd packages/db && pnpm run db:studio && cd ../..
scripts.db:drop: cd packages/db && pnpm run db:drop && cd ../..
scripts.db:check: cd packages/db && pnpm run db:check && cd ../..
scripts.db:up: cd packages/db && pnpm run db:up && cd ../..
